alert.note: Alert for Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys; Upper Kuskokwim Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 1:22PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Breezy and blustery conditions through Sunday... Breezy conditions will continue across the area with the higher elevations of the Nulato Hills and areas along the Norton Sound Coast seeing the strongest winds. Winds will be northeast at 15 to 30 mph and gusty in the Nulato Hills and the Norton Sound Coast, and northeast 5 to 15 mph in the Upper Kuskokwim, and Middle and Lower Yukon Valleys. Winds will diminish along the Norton Sound Coast and in the Nulato Hills to 15 to 25 mph and gusty tonight. Temperatures will range from the teens above during the day to single digits to lower teens below overnight. Wind Chill will range from around 30 below at night to around zero during the day. For the latest forecasts go to www.weather.gov/fairbanks.

area.areaDesc: Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys; Upper Kuskokwim Valley
